Package chord

Class Lookup

  • java.lang.Object
    • chord.Lookup
  • public class Lookup
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a useful structure for keeping track of the information related to a lookup operation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Lookup​(java.lang.Integer id, java.lang.Integer request_key, java.lang.Integer node_req_id, java.lang.Double tick, java.lang.Integer prioriCorrectNode, TopologyBuilder top)
      Public constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.Boolean getResult()
      Returns if the responsible has been found or if the node retrieved has the target key but is crashed
      java.lang.Boolean isComplete()
      Returns if the lookup has been completed
      void setResult​(Node nodeRes, java.lang.Integer path_length, java.lang.Integer num_timeouts, java.lang.Integer nodes_contacted, java.lang.Double delay_response)
      Sets the result information
      java.lang.String toCSV()
      Returns a string in CSV format containing the relevant information for the analysis

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lookup

        public Lookup​(java.lang.Integer id,
              java.lang.Integer request_key,
              java.lang.Integer node_req_id,
              java.lang.Double tick,
              java.lang.Integer prioriCorrectNode,
              TopologyBuilder top)
        Public constructor
        Parameters:
        id - id of the lookup operation
        request_key - key to look for (target key)
        node_req_id - id of the lookup initiator
        tick - starting simulation tick
        prioriCorrectNode - id of the correct result
        top - reference to the TopologyBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • setResult

        public void setResult​(Node nodeRes,
                      java.lang.Integer path_length,
                      java.lang.Integer num_timeouts,
                      java.lang.Integer nodes_contacted,
                      java.lang.Double delay_response)
        Sets the result information
        Parameters:
        nodeRes - reference to the responsible for the target key
        path_length - length of the path between the lookup initiator and the responsible
        num_timeouts - number of timeouts encountered during the lookup
        nodes_contacted - number of nodes contacted
        delay_response - random delay for a simulated response

      • getResult

        public java.lang.Boolean getResult()
        Returns if the responsible has been found or if the node retrieved has the target key but is crashed
        Returns:
        true if the responsible has been found or if the node found has the target key but is crashed, false otherwise

      • isComplete

        public java.lang.Boolean isComplete()
        Returns if the lookup has been completed
        Returns:
        true if it has been completed, false otherwise

      • toCSV

        public java.lang.String toCSV()
        Returns a string in CSV format containing the relevant information for the analysis
        Returns:
        a string in CSV format containing the relevant information for the analysis

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
